title: "Solution"? For the League of legend down (and many more other services)

embed.description: If you hear about a Level 3 Internet outage today and haven't heard this company mentioned before, then you might be wondering how problems involving the Level3 network could take down your access to Yahoo Mail, PSN, Xbox Live, Outlook, BT, Twitch, HBO Go, Craigslist, and other networks/services.

body:
Found this on the internet just a min ago. Not sure if this is what is causin to be a problem?
At least i cant do anything. Steam,ps network, LoL, microsoft all down for me.
FInland here

replies.body: If you get your internet through Level 3, then yea you're most likely going to see some problems using any of their services. It looks like they're working quickly to get everything going again, but be sure to check back with them for any updates!
